title: >>> The Battle of KATHRYN
body_text:
Dodgeball has turned into one great big lovefest ... or has it? With one Kathryn Nogueira at the core of the controversy, all hell is sure to break loose. Hearts will be broken in this soon-to-be classic encounter.
The Challenge
: In the hours that followed the Toms River Tournament, two icons agreed to a match in which both would fight over Kathryn Nogueira's heart.
>> The Beginning ...
Saturday Night Bowling
, a weekly gathering where superstars would fight for bowling supremacy.
SNB
created everlasting feuds and rivalries and formed bonds that remain to this day. One of those friendships was born on November 27, 2004, featuring the debut of two incredible women: Kathryn Nogueira and Lauren Winston.
Less than a year after the collapse of
SNB
emerged the impromtu creation of dodgeball. Like its predecessor, dodgeball became a weekly attraction generating the likes of over 60 people in the first ten weeks. Of those 60, one would form a very special relationship with Kathryn, eventually becoming her own boyfriend at the beginning of 2007: Tom Adams.
>> The Now ...
"Kitty's" closest allies look to earn a place in her heart when members of the two most recognized families square off for the first time ever!
Who will survive this "HeartBreaking" Affair? Find out live Saturday,
February 24
, 2007.
**See the full size poster!
body_html:
Dodgeball has turned into one great big lovefest ... or has it? With one Kathryn Nogueira at the core of the controversy, all hell is sure to break loose. Hearts will be broken in this soon-to-be classic encounter.

The Challenge: In the hours that followed the Toms River Tournament, two icons agreed to a match in which both would fight over Kathryn Nogueira's heart.

>> The Beginning ...
Saturday Night Bowling, a weekly gathering where superstars would fight for bowling supremacy. SNB created everlasting feuds and rivalries and formed bonds that remain to this day. One of those friendships was born on November 27, 2004, featuring the debut of two incredible women: Kathryn Nogueira and Lauren Winston.

Less than a year after the collapse of SNB emerged the impromtu creation of dodgeball. Like its predecessor, dodgeball became a weekly attraction generating the likes of over 60 people in the first ten weeks. Of those 60, one would form a very special relationship with Kathryn, eventually becoming her own boyfriend at the beginning of 2007: Tom Adams.

>> The Now ...


"Kitty's" closest allies look to earn a place in her heart when members of the two most recognized families square off for the first time ever!

Who will survive this "HeartBreaking" Affair? Find out live Saturday, February 24, 2007.

**See the full size poster!
